title: Surly 24 and 8 Pack Racks Get an Update for 2024
content:
Back for 2024 with a fresh redesign focused on increased security and simplified installation, Surlyâ€™s popular 8 and 24-Pack Racks provide two size options depending on your cargo capacity needs. The 8-Pack Rack ($130) has a smaller deck platform (160 mm x 270 mm) and the 24 Pack Rack ($155) is a modern porteur rack, with a larger platform (400 mm x 270 mm).

Due to their Chromoly tubing construction with stainless-steel hardware, they each have a 30 lb weight limit and provide the same height adjustability as the original 8 and 24-Pack Racks, so you can keep your cargo close to the ground and stable. Available in silver or black finish.

Check out the new 8 Pack and 24-Pack Racks at Surly.
